General.Name: Xinjiang Lixin Energy Co. Ltd. A
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Xinjiang Lixin Energy Co., LTD. engages in the investment, development, construction, and operation of wind power and photovoltaic power generation projects in China. It has a total installed capacity of the power generation project of 1,029.00 megawatts. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Urumqi, China.
General.Address: West Green Valley Building, Urumqi, China, 830000
